name: ReactJS Calculator
text: This was my first React.JS project. I built the calculator dynamically and adjusted to new React syntax.

name: Lies From Granny
text: This website is a marketing tool for Lies From Granny, my band. It's target audiences are fans and potential venues.

name: Burger Bonanza
text: This is a full-stack application which stores user input data. I wrote all the front-end and back-end code to specifications outlined in our project requirements.
features: MVC development with ORM and MySQL

name: Employee Tracker Database
text: This CLI application allows users to save employee information, including roles, salaries and departments, to a database.

name: Note Taker
text: This note taker allows the user to write and save notes, delete notes, and ultimately keep tasks organized.

name: Employee Summary Templater
text: We used Object Oriented Programming to create a reusable design depending on the number of employees desired in the summary.

name: GitHub Profile Generator
text: Using Inquirer in the CLI, the user answers two questions to get a custom GitHub profile PDF. This was our introduction to NPM packages.

name: Group Project - Trivia Game
text: Working with two classmates, we built a randomized trivia game. I focused on using JavaScript and AJAX calls to create the gameplay.
features: AJAX calls to generate the questions

name: Weather Dashboard
text: This was our first project using AJAX calls to access information via an API. Also got more practice with CSS and JQuery
